articles.content: The steady stream of data regarding the spread of the coronavirus has proved inconsistent at times, particularly when it comes to mortality. For example, the United Kingdom has only been counting people who tested positive for COVID-19 before dying in hospita… [+1805 chars]

articles.title: Cedar Rapids man in custody after high speed chase early Tuesday morning - KCRG
